segments.text: Hey.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Hey.  How's it going?  I haven't seen you in awhile.

segments.text: Pretty good Susanna.

segments.speaker: F

segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Um--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Me. Yeah, I did.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No way. Are you serious? Oh my God.  Congratulations. I'm so excited.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.

segments.text: I got into the...
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I got into cinema production.
segments.speaker: M

segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No.  It's like it's harder than getting into Harvard.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know.  Oh my God.  Oh my God Joe I am so happy for you.  Well you know what that means?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What does that mean?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You're going to be here and I'm going to be in LA so we can be together now.  I mean we can be in the same city.

segments.text: Holy shit...
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: We can party.  We can have fun.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This will be like high school but even better.

segments.text: Yeah.  Hopefully it won't be like high school.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh man I am so proud of you, that is...how did you get...I mean what did you do?  How did you find out or what...?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I-I came home and my mom was like Joe uh-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I have some bad news.  I was like what?  She's like not really you got into U.S.C. and I was like, I was like oh my God.  I was about to tear my own hair out.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh man.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  This is so crazy.  I mean I didn't get into any other school but I got into the school I wanted.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Did you say yes yet?  I mean have you sent in your answer?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh my God the first minute I got it I sent it back in.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: All right.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: So...

segments.text: This is so great, you know, because I gone fit on downtown so I'm going to be like right here.  I think I'm going to be living at City Lights downtown.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This is so exciting.  This is like a new chapter in our lives.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, it really is.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: We're doing what we want to do, then four years later we're going to be working professionals, making money, sipping martinis every day.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: God hopefully.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Man I'm just so happy for you.  I just--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Thank you
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well, I'm happy for you but I'm happy for me cause that means you're going to stay.

segments.text: Oh great. I would love to go.

segments.text: Yeah.
